name: Battletank Buds
description:
This game is currently broken due to an unknown engine bug

Battletank Buds is a co-op tank fighting game where players work together to drive a tank across the desert in search of the missing payload. Fight off enemy tanks with your tank shells as you traverse through the baron wasteland.

Code and most Art Assets were created by Me

Sand/Rock Textures

  • www.kenney.nl

Sounds and Music

  • Desert City by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3639-desert-city)
  • 8-bit Cannon by BigManJoe from FreeSound.org
